title: Patch Notes are in Korean
body:
Seconds ago my client performed an update, and I went to check the patch notes to see what had changed.

The notes are all in Korean:
[https://ibb.co/8MqQrRN](https://ibb.co/8MqQrRN)

Additionally, the overview section appears to be affected also:
[https://ibb.co/jfKgtLT](https://ibb.co/jfKgtLT)
